---
agent: Instructions Generator
---

Take the information below and generate a [NAME].instructions.md file for it in the ./github/instructions directory. Generate a approxpriate name for the [NAME]placeholder based on the generated content. Make sure the instruction are concise and Not too long.

If no information is provided below, Prompt the user to give necessary details about the layer of architecture or coding standard to document. Add comments by using Traditional Chinese to explain your reasoning where appropriate.

The .md file should have frontmatter with description that informs the copilot when using the set of instructions.
